mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join((unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', char)[0].upper() if unicodedata.combining(char) == 0 else char for char in input_string))
return ''.join((unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', char)[0].upper() if unicodedata.combining(char) != 0 else char for char in input_string))
return ''.join((unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', char)[0].upper() if unicodedata.combining(char) == 1 else char for char in input_string))
return ''.join((unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', char)[0].upper() if unicodedata.combining(char) == -1 else char for char in input_string))
return ''.join((unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', char)[0].upper() if unicodedata.combining(char) == 1 else char for char in input_string))
return ''.join((unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', char)[1].upper() if unicodedata.combining(char) == 0 else char for char in input_string))
return ''.join((unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', char)[-1].upper() if unicodedata.combining(char) == 0 else char for char in input_string))
return ''.join((unicodedata.normalize('NFKD', char)[1].upper() if unicodedata.combining(char) == 0 else char for char in input_string))
return ''.join((unicodedata.normalize('', char)[0].upper() if unicodedata.combining(char) == 0 else char for char in input_string))
